titleInfo.title: Presbyterian Church maintains the tie around the world, 1944

name.namePart: Presbyterian Church in the U.S. Defense Service Council

location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: Multi-fold brochure containing text, maps, and photographs issued by the Defense Service Council of the Presbyterian Church in the U.S., 1944. Brochure describes various activities of Presbyterian chaplains serving United States armed forces at home and abroad during World War II. Forms part of Churches Ephemera Subject Files. 1 brochure: col., 5 x 7 in.
mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital image. This image is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without written permission. Please contact the repository for permission to use this image.

subject.topic: Presbyterian Church in the U.S. Defense Service Council
